'''Pyro Crystalfly''' is a type of [[Crystalfly]] that can be found in the wild in [[Natlan]].

They generate 1 [[Phlogiston]] Particle when collected, partially refilling the player's Phlogiston meter.

==Drops==
Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into the player's in-game [[archive]].
{{Card|Crystal Core|1}}
